messages.message:
Iâ€™d like to see a copy button in each Converse response, maybe just have it appear when you hover over the response. If I were using Converse to summarize something or pull out key information, I might want to be able to then easily copy that response and paste it into an email or something.

The ability to download a conversation might also be helpful. Maybe if I want to clear the conversation but still hold onto the responses, or want to be able to quickly reference/share responses without needing to reopen AI Hub.
Yes, we have got that feedback from others as well, especially for tables, etc. Same thing on download of the whole conversation. Thanks for sharing!
yeah copying a convo can be very useful
